description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Cheddar, Fig & Pancetta Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Cheddar, Fig & Pancetta Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 sheet frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line base and sides of a 20x30cm slice pan with baking paper.
Lay pastry into pan, joining and trimming sheets to fit and pricking the base all over with a fork. Bake for 15 minutes or until base is lightly golden.
Meanwhile, whisk eggs, sour cream and chives together. Season.
Pour egg mixture into pastry case. Tear over pancetta and top with cheddar. Bake for 15 minutes or until just set in the centre. Top with figs.
Combine oil, vinegar and honey in a small screw-top jar and season. Shake well and drizzle over rocket. Scatter some of the rocket over tart. Slice and serve with remaining rocket salad.
